check_in.early_arrival: Guests may arrive from 10:30 AM for pre-check-in (bag drop, WiFi, bar/terrace access)
check_in.late_check_in: After 10:30 PM by prior arrangement; out-of-hours check-in process provided

check_out.late_checkout: Available until 12:00 PM for €40 fee, subject to availability
check_out.post_checkout_amenities: Bag storage and facilities available until 3:30 PM on departure day

cancellation.refundable: Free cancellation up to 72 hours before 3:00 PM on check-in day
cancellation.non_refundable: Pre-paid, non-refundable bookings cannot be cancelled or refunded
cancellation.admin_fee: Administrative fee may apply for cancellations

no_show.charge: Maximum of first night rate or deposit amount

modifications.date_change: Subject to availability; contact hostel to request
modifications.room_change: Subject to availability; contact hostel to request
modifications.extension: Subject to availability and 7-night maximum stay limit

deposit.keycard_linen: €10 deposit collected at check-in, refundable at checkout

city_tax.note: Collected at check-in as per local regulations

general.liability: Hostel accepts no liability for stored luggage

departure_day.after_hours: Porter service available after 3:30 PM at €15 per bag

arrival_day.note: Guests may store bags before check-in time

eligibility.ota_excluded: Bookings via OTAs (Hostelworld, Booking.com, etc.) do not include breakfast

ordering.collection: Must be collected within 30 minutes of ordering

usage.supported: Web browsing, email, and general internet use
usage.not_guaranteed: Streaming, video calls, or high-bandwidth activities
usage.note: Connection speeds may vary; no minimum speed guaranteed

security.disclaimer: Hostel does not guarantee network security; guests use at own risk

alcohol.rule: Outside alcohol not permitted on premises
alcohol.reason: Licensed property; alcohol must be purchased on-site
